sourcesContent:
News Articles

  • {{ news.title }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NewsService } from '../../services/news.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-news-list', templateUrl: './news-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./news-list.component.scss'] }) export class NewsListComponent implements OnInit { newsList: any[] = []; filterName: string = ''; constructor(private newsService: NewsService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchNews(); } fetchNews(): void { this.newsService.getNews(this.filterName).subscribe( (data) => { this.newsList = data; }, (error) => { console.error('Error fetching news:', error); } ); } onFilterChange(): void { this.fetchNews(); } }
